arcadians.name: Arcadians
arcadians.desc: Arcadians are the group of people born and raised in Arcadia, the space station orbiting earth.

citizens.name: Holo Citizens
citizens.desc: Everyone born in Holo City is tracked with a chip implanted at birth, forever indebting them to various corporations for their whole lives.

edenites.name: Edenites
edenites.desc: Forest-dwelling nature-lovers. Somewhat zealous but good-hearted.
